result.reason: Current implementation explicitly handles single-item editing in ConfigWindow and ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid, limiting the PropertyGrid to one object; enabling multi-edit requires refactoring these components to pass and handle a list of selected connections.
result.approach: Update ConnectionTree to pass all selected nodes to ConfigWindow. Update ConfigWindow and ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid to accept a list of connections. Refactor property filtering logic in ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid to determine common properties and exclusions for the selected set, then use the underlying PropertyGrid.SelectedObjects.
